title: You have to go home again, Scarlet Hollow Episode 5 is out now
tags: the game is currently 25% off on Steam;Slay the Princess: The Pristine Cut review — Princess my reflectionYou have returned to the path, the path that leads to the cabin. In that cabin remains the Princess, and your job is still to slay her. But something’s different. The path leads to more places, the princess more multifaceted, the pristine blade more… pristine.
